title: The Frog (TV series)
text:
The Frog () is a <a href="Crime%20film">crime</a> and <a href="Mystery%20film">mystery</a> series written, edited and directed by <a href="Houman%20Seyyedi">Houman Seyyedi</a> and produced by Ali Asadzadeh, produced in 2020–2021 in <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. This series is the first series made by Houman Seyyedi, the first episode of which was supposed to be released on December 15, 2020, but the broadcast of this series was stopped by <a href="Ministry%20of%20Culture%20and%20Islamic%20Guidance">court</a> order. Finally, the first part of this series was released on December 23, 2020.
Plot.
On the <a href="Chaharshanbe%20Suri">Chaharshanbe Suri</a> day, three <a href="friend">friend</a>s named Ramin (<a href="Saber%20Abar">Saber Abr</a>), Farid (Ashkan Hassanpour), and Javad (Shahrooz Del Afkar) after stealing the weapon of a wounded officer, rob Noori (<a href="Navid%20Mohammadzadeh">Navid Mohammadzadeh</a>), Ramin's childhood classmate, who has become a rich and mysterious man...
Production.
"The Frog" series is the first series directed by Houman Seyyedi and is also Navid Mohammadzadeh's first series. "The Frog", which started filming in 2019 and stopped production due to the outbreak of the <a href="Coronavirus">Coronavirus</a>, ended its filming in the summer of 2020 and was written in 15 episodes. The filming of the Frog project took about two years.
Resales.
Negotiations were held for the release of the series on the <a href="Netflix">Netflix</a> platform, but no agreement was reached, and the series was finally released on the Namava platform. The first episode of this series was a free impression of the film <a href="La%20Haine">La Haine</a>. 48 hours after the release of this episode, the <a href="Television%20series">series</a> set a record with 40 million views in <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="home%20video">home video</a>.
Reception.
Critical response.
<a href="Massoud%20Farasati">Massoud Farasati</a> criticized the series in <a href="Haft%20%28TV%20program%29">Haft program</a> and said:
Brian O’Shea, CEO of The Exchange:
